titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5254) to set schedules for the consideration of permits for refineries.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5254) to set schedules for the consideration of permits for refineries.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-482, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5254 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 186.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 842.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 842, Mr. Lincoln Diaz-Balart moved the previous question and by voice vote, the Chair announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Matsui demanded the Yeas and Nays which were subsequently ordered and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question and adoption of the resolution until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 192 (Roll no. 227).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 192 (Roll no. 228).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5254 (Refinery Permit Process Schedule Act).
